mapper.select: select boardno, btitle, userid, bcontent, bdate, bcount, board_origin, board_re from communityqnas order by board_origin desc, boardno asc
mapper.insert:
select seq_communityqnas_boardno.nextval from dual
insert into communityqnas (boardno, btitle, bcontent, userid, bdate, bcount, board_origin, board_re) values (#{boardno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{userid}, sysdate, 0, #{board_origin}, #{board_re})
mapper.update: update communityqnas set bcount=bcount+1 where boardno=#{boardno}
